Html:
Hi,

We currently using PHPExcel version 1.7.0 and we have no issue in styles when we insert new rows before any rows that already have styles. However, when we switched to version 1.7.1, in Excel5 writer, the background color of rows changed when we insert new rows before the rows have some background color. Also, When we used Excel2007 writer, the borders and default font not set properly. We have no issue with the discussed items in version 1.7.0 but we need to use some features and bug fixes of 1.7.1. As, the code is proprietary, so I am unable to send or create some sample, however, I have attached screenshots:

  • http://www.railratechecker.com/temp/color-before-rows-insert-excel5.png
  • http://www.railratechecker.com/temp/color-after-rows-insert-excel5.png
  • http://www.railratechecker.com/temp/default-font-not-set-excel2007.png (we set default font as Arial same as shown in first two images)
  • http://www.railratechecker.com/temp/borders-not-set-excel2007.png (borders and default font not set as shown in first two images)

Thanks in advance.

Thanks for your report. This is something we very much would like to get fixed.

Unfortunately, I am not able to reproduce this by running some simple tests locally. So I ask you to send me those files from your screen shots for closer examination.

Please send me the files to this email address: (erik at phpexcel dot net)

Thanks Koyama! Let me get some free and try to create some sample. I will hopefully re-contact you.

Thanks again and Regards.

Files received via email. Bug verified.

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10896

Download latest source code tomorrow from here:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx

Problems were only partially solved. New work item created:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10922

Can you check again with latest source code tomorrow:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx

Thanks Koyama! my problems have been solved. We have reset the font by giving the rang of cells.

Once again thanks.
